claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

combined_evidence.quote: RIV4 (recombinant HA vaccine) 0.5-mL PFS ≥18 yrs 45 µg/0.5 mL IM
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote specifies that the recombinant HA vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) contains 45 micrograms of HA per 0.5 mL dose, directly supporting the claim about Flublok's HA content per strain.

combined_evidence.quote: Fluzone Quadrivalent (Sanofi Pasteur) 0.5-mL PFS†† ≥6 mos†† 15 µg/0.5 mL IM
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote shows that the standard-dose influenza vaccine (Fluzone Quadrivalent) contains 15 micrograms of HA per 0.5 mL dose, supporting the comparison in the claim.

combined_evidence.quote: FluLaval Quadrivalent 0.5 mL PFS ≥6 mos 15 µg/0.5 mL
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote shows that a standard-dose influenza vaccine (FluLaval Quadrivalent) contains 15 micrograms of HA per 0.5 mL dose, supporting the comparison in the claim.
